actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 94-611.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 94-476.

official_title: An Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into cooperative agreements which benefit certain Forest Service programs and to advance or reimburse funds to cooperators for work performed, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 94-611) Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to negotiate and enter into cooperative agreements with public or private agencies, organizations, institutions, or persons for the following purposes: (1) to construct, operate, and maintain cooperative pollution abatement equipment and facilities; (2) to engage in cooperative manpower and job training and development programs; (3) to develop and publish cooperative environmental education and forest history materials; and (4) to perform forestry protection. Authorizes the Forest Service personnel to supervise such cooperators and their employees in emergencies or otherwise as mutually agreed to.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into cooperative agreements which benefit certain Forest Service programs and to advance or reimburse funds to cooperators for work performed.

An Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into cooperative agreements which benefit certain Forest Service programs and to advance or reimburse funds to cooperators for work performed, and for other purposes.
